insert into activity
id,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
activity_des,
activity_img,
activity_info_img,
activity_content,
activity_info_content,
is_deleted,

mapper.update:
update activity
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=BIGINT},
activity_des = #{activityDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_img = #{activityImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_info_img = #{activityInfoImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_content = #{activityContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_info_content = #{activityInfoContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
